alert.note: Alert for Grayson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 08 at 9:43PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Grayson County through 1015 PM CDT... At 943 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Knollwood, or near Sherman, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Sherman, Denison, Howe, Pottsboro, Tom Bean, Knollwood, Dorchester, Randell Lake, Eisenhower State Park, Southmayd, Boddie, Ida, Carpenters Bluff, Luella, and White Mound. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
